Title: TABLET
Description:
Terminal Automation Batch Language Environment for Telescopes (TABLET) is a language for controlling computerized telescopes in an easy and friendly environment. It's now designed for the public remote stations of Hanggao Astronomical Observatory. It's a .net project.
望远镜终端自动化批处理语言环境（TABLET）是一种能让用户在简单而友好的环境中控制计算机化望远镜的语言。TABLET是为杭州高级中学天文台的公众远程观测站所设计的。这是一个.net项目。
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Terminal Automation Batch Language Environment for Telescopes (TABLET) is a language for controlling computerized telescopes in an easy and friendly environment. It's now designed for the public remote stations of Hanggao Astronomical Observatory. It's a .net project.
望远镜终端自动化批处理语言环境（TABLET）是一种能让用户在简单而友好的环境中控制计算机化望远镜的语言。TABLET是为杭州高级中学天文台的公众远程观测站所设计的。这是一个.net项目。

This project is no longer maintained, and the source code has been transferred to GitHub for continued access due to the announced shutdown of CodePlex. The new host can be found at https://github.com/SequoiaDu/tablet.
